Summary: Large fireball with sparks on tail-end.
divs: Sighting DetailsWas facing north locking my barn and reflection on barn was so bright we turned around to see the sky was lit up bright as day. Walked south 100 feet to end of driveway and saw fireball heading south-east towards Toronto. Sparks were flying from tail-end, very bright. Heard a sort of fizzing during sighting, and faint sort of thunder sound could be heard after object could no longer be seen. Lost sight because of large tree-line in the south. Estimate size as about twice as big as my thumbnail at arm's length.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Orangeville
There were no other sightings in Orangeville on or around September 25th 2009
